li.text: The user clicks the mouse button again at the opposite corner of the rectangle. As with points, the
dialog box is used to specify the properties of the object.

para.text: Typical uses of rectangle objects are the same as for
; that is, to define zones with differing media properties. Rectangle objects are more frequently used in purely hypothetical models rather than in models of actual systems.
